content.rendered:
Looking to update your kitchen with products that are useful as well as attractive? Snapdeal brings to you Pasabahce glass olivia bottle with a cork, that isn’t only a useful utensil, but also a gorgeous one with the perfect combination of practicality and aesthetics.

This beautiful bottle will certainly pep up your kitchen visually. The long neck and slender handle have an old world charm that is the perfect accent to any decor. The cork of the bottle gives it a classic vintage appeal. This bottle will move easily from your kitchen to your dining table.

excerpt.rendered: Multifunctional bottle in kitchen, with 8 functions. Temperature resistance:The light blue one: -20 centigrade to +120 centigrade, -30 centigrade to +80 centigrade.
